descriptions: Fixed critical SQL error Unknown column 'identifier' on QBCore/Qbox frameworks by implementing dynamic query generation for citizen searches
Added full support for QBCore/Qbox database schema (`players` table, `citizenid` column and `charinfo` JSON extraction) in citizen search and profile view
Refactored server-side Audit Log system to use named arguments for translation interpolation, fixing issues where variables were not displaying correctly in logs
Fixed multiple `SERVER.AuditLog` calls to ensure officer names, badge numbers, and log details are correctly formatted and passed to the audit system
